snippet: Leon E. Panetta announced a date for the end of the American combat role in Afghanistan; NATO played down a leaked internal report on collaboration between the Afghan government, the Taliban and Pakistan; Pakistan revealed an anthrax plot; and a NATO...
abstract: Leon E. Panetta announced a date for the end of the American combat role in Afghanistan; NATO played down a leaked internal report on collaboration between the Afghan government, the Taliban and Pakistan; Pakistan revealed an anthrax plot; and a NATO solider was killed by a man in an Afghan Army uniform.
